name: Onslaught on the Colony
description:
This game is my submission for the Brackeys 2021.1 Game Jam made between February 14th and 21st! 

To fit with the theme Stronger together, I have made a wave based game, where the player is stronger by placed pylons that enable certain abilities.

Any feedback is appreciated and encouraged.

Enjoy playing!

Controls: WASDMoveEUse upgrade terminalFPlace pylonSpaceUse jump jets

Please note that some sounds and design intentions on the WebGL versions are not how they should be, so the Windows version would be more stable to try.

Links: My Twitter: https://twitter.com/BarnesCoding
